pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface Package for the 'EpiGraphDB' Platform // The interface package to access data from the 'EpiGraphDB' https://epigraphdb.org platform. It provides easy access to the 'EpiGraphDB' platform with functions that query the corresponding REST endpoints on the API https://api.epigraphdb.org and return the response data in the 'tibble' data frame format.
